entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain or snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
